job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer

job.description: Entry LevelFull Stack Java DeveloperbrbrColumbus OHbrbrstrongREAD BEFORE YOU APPLYbrbrstrongstrongOpportunity strongPer Scholas is helping to source candidates for multiple fulltime Full Stack Java Developer positions with our employer partner TEKsystems looking to hire in Columbus and will offer a 14week tuition free Java Developer training course to candidates looking to applybrbrstrongAbout Us strongPer Scholas is a national organization that has been advancing economic mobility for 25 years We have partnered with employers that are looking to recruit and hire our graduates into entry and midlevel Java Developer positions The ideal candidate for this opportunity is motivated ready to start a job in the IT field has existing object oriented programming exposure and is looking to receive technical training professional development career coaching and job placement The training is 7 weeks MF 9am4pm It is unpaid for the duration of the training but will have the opportunity to lead to career placement with TEKsystems with salary starting at 52000year and abovebrbrstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongIdeal candidates will have an interest in jumpstarting their career in tech and have proficient knowledge in object oriented programming They are organized agile individuals interested in business processes client management project management and working with a global team of business and technology professionals To be successful candidates need to possess basic literacy math critical thinking and selfteaching skills do well in fastpaced environments and be able to learn new technologies quicklybrbrstronguWhat We Are Looking ForbrustrongulliMust have at least a High School diploma or GEDliliMust be authorized to work in the USliliMust have a passion for learning and jumpstarting a career in technologyliliMust be able to commit a Monday  Friday 900am  400pmliliMust be located in Columbus or surrounding arealiliMust have demonstrable knowledge in core java SQL and frontend developmentbrliulWe are not currently offering visa sponsorship or transfers but we will accept applications from individuals with work authorization
